single_crochet on previous row fasten_off braids will go through this loop braids make two  cut 6 lengths of green yarn and 3 lengths of red yarn about three times as long as you want your finished braids to be braids pictured are about 8 in so i cut at about 24 inches  line up your ends and feed through the loop at the bottom of the ear flap direction is not important you ll now have 18 strands  pull all the ends even divide into three groups and braid tie a knot in the end of the braid and trim ends evenly mohawk  cut about 250 more or less to your taste lengths of red yarn  for each strand insert hook under/in between stitches pull up a loop pull both strand ends through loop tighten start at the center front just above the top red stripe and finish at the back just above the bottom red line this will camouflage the slightly uneven color changes at round ends each row of hair should be 4-5 strands wide keep your eye on the top center of the hat to keep your mohawk
